results.content: Good introduction into programming concepts, although heavily web-focused, which may not be a good fit for everyone. A decent starting point for plenty of people nonetheless.
results.content_html: Good introduction into programming concepts, although heavily web-focused, which may not be a good fit for everyone. A decent starting point for plenty of people nonetheless.

results.content: It's a good course but not according to its title, that's why I didn't give 5 stars. It's a good background course for those who want to learn web development, it's too long a course for those who want to learn programming. In addition, there is a lot of unnecessary historical background.
results.content_html: It's a good course but not according to its title, that's why I didn't give 5 stars. It's a good background course for those who want to learn web development, it's too long a course for those who want to learn programming. In addition, there is a lot of unnecessary historical background.

results.content: Good Course take the first steps when you start programming, this course give short overview on how to go forward and which programming language is helpful to start with and so on.
results.content_html: Good Course take the first steps when you start programming, this course give short overview on how to go forward and which programming language is helpful to start with and so on.

results.content: I find the course very interesting and it covered a lot of the topics I wanted. For everyone who looks a birds-eye view of the programming world this course is for you.
results.content_html: I find the course very interesting and it covered a lot of the topics I wanted. For everyone who looks a birds-eye view of the programming world this course is for you.

results.content: Well, it delivered exactly what it promised :) I now have a basic understanding of what is coding, so I’m more confident to move forward with my learn path and became a programmer
results.content_html: Well, it delivered exactly what it promised :) I now have a basic understanding of what is coding, so I’m more confident to move forward with my learn path and became a programmer

results.content: It was a great intro course for someone without much of a technology background . The instructor explained the ideas well and was entertaining. A great way to dip your toe in the water.
results.content_html: It was a great intro course for someone without much of a technology background . The instructor explained the ideas well and was entertaining. A great way to dip your toe in the water.

results.content: Perfect course If you want to have a basic overview of what is like to be a programmer and what is a programming language in general. I definitely recommend this course if you’re not sure if you want to move into the programming direction with your career.
results.content_html: Perfect course If you want to have a basic overview of what is like to be a programmer and what is a programming language in general. I definitely recommend this course if you’re not sure if you want to move into the programming direction with your career.

results.content:
The beginning of the course is very good, going into computers and internet. Then, some lectures are missing. Like on some language components (loops, functions, conditionals), types of frameworks, debugging.
Anyway, I received useful things didn't know earlier which is the main goal.
Thank you.
results.content_html:

results.content: Well I'm not going to talk too much about Evan's amazing teaching method, but I can speak about my personal experience..I just graduated from a french medium university and my major was sociology. So as you can guess, i spent my whole uni years by learning french and philosophy history etc.. the only thing that I knew about computer is to google for famous sociologist and to use powerpoint.. But I decided to learn software computer kind of things from scratch. And  i think  Evan  is one of the best teacher if you are like me -don't know anything about tech or computer- Give it a go, you won't regret. I learn so many things; thank you Evan.

results.content:
Evan presents the course in a easy to learn format with a recap of the learning objectives at the end of each video.  This great.  The pdf files he provides does the learner justice in help reinforce the material taught.

Marlon Cole
